### Applying to graduate school
Below are a list of resources for navigating the various stages of applying for a PhD:

* Contacting potential advisors
  + [Columbia E3B](https://e3b.columbia.edu/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Email-Template-for-Prospective-Grad-Students-to-PI.pdf)
  + [Cornell EEB](https://ecologyandevolution.cornell.edu/sites/eeb/files/Tips%20for%20contacting%20potential%20advisors.pdf)
  + [First Gen Guide](https://first-gen-guide.com/2020/07/24/phd-admissions-emailing-potential-advisors/)
* Meeting with potential advisor and asking questions
  + [Columbia E3B](https://e3b.columbia.edu/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Guide-on-Meeting-with-Potential-Advisor-and-Asking-Questions-of-a-Grad-Program.pdf)
  + [DiscoverPhDs](https://www.discoverphds.com/blog/questions-to-ask-during-your-phd-interview)

### Postdoctoral fellowships
Below are a list of fellowships for postdoctoral scientists:

* [University of California President's Postdoctoral Fellowship Program](https://ppfp.ucop.edu/info/)
* [Ford Foundation Fellowship Program](https://sites.nationalacademies.org/pga/fordfellowships/pga_047960)
* [Smith Fellows](https://conbio.org/mini-sites/smith-fellows)
